mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_food (lid, fname, fdetail, faddr, fphone, fgmenu, kid, fimg1, fimg2, fimg3) VALUES (#{lid}, #{fname}, #{fdetail}, #{faddr}, #{fphone}, #{fgmenu}, #{kid}, #{fimg1}, #{fimg2}, #{fimg3})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM f_food order by fid DESC
SELECT * FROM f_food(fname, fdetail, faddr, fphone, fgmenu, fimg1, like) where fname =#{keyword} OR fdetail =#{keyword} OR faddr =#{keyword} OR fphone =#{keyword} OR fgmenu = #{keyword}
